translation_en: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
Owner of the Day of Recompense.

arabic: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ
translation_en: Allah — there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.

arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
translation_en: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

arabic: وَاعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَلَا تُشْرِكُوا بِهِ شَيْئًا
translation_en: Worship Allah and do not associate anything with Him.
For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
